records.name: EVM
records.label: C-Chain / EVM Address
records.description: Address on EVM-type network, including Avalanche C-Chain

records.name: VALIDATOR
records.label: Validator NodeID
records.description: Validator NodeID on the Avalanche Network

records.name: AVATAR
records.label: Avatar
records.description: An image which the user wishes to use as their avatar. Value should be a URL which references the image.

records.name: CONTENT
records.label: Content
records.description: A downloadable file. Value should be a URL (e.g. IPFS, HTTPS, ..) which references the image.
